title: Cannot Download/Install LoL??
body:
I had to uninstall league a few weeks ago. I have tried 7-8 times now to install it again (making sure there was no trace of LoL on my computer from before), and. Every. Single. Time. I get to about 45m-1h into the download, it gets to 66%, 67%, or 71%, and stops. My kbps download speed slowly goes from 1,300 to 100, 80, 40, 20, 10, and eventually 0. As soon as it hits 0, my internet browser stops responding and so do all other programs on my computer. I eventually have to reboot. 

Like I said, this has happened seven or eight times now, and I'm getting sick of it. I've called Dell tech support, had them scour my computer for a reason, and nothing. I have no viruses (Checked twice with two anti-viruses), no problems with firewall, nothing. LoL just isn't downloading, and is now crashing my computer when I try to download it. 

WTF???

replies.body:
I got the same issue, and Mr. Dartagnan's so called "tip" is nothing but BS.
Seriously thinking about uninstalling and getting something called...
A Life.
OR! 
Riot could hire competent programmers, and I continue to spend hundreds on this game.
I have found nothing to fix this problem though... Sorry mate.

Hello SeniorGobblecok!

From reading through your post, it appears that the initial installation seems to download and install successfully.  The issues you are describing seems to occur when you attempt to download the latest patch for League of Legends.  Because of that, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps in the following Article:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/28732434-Patching-Issues

It does have an absolutely ridiculous amount of steps to be completed, but they can all help in getting you fully patched up.  Because of that, make sure that you complete every single step found there.

If you completed all of these steps, and you are still crawling, and crawling until you end up at a full stop, don't despair with the Harrowing just yet!  Make sure to [submit a new ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to our Tech Team.  They can look into this issue a bit more for you and provide some additional solutions!  If you do send us a ticket, make sure to include the following information:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
